about_the_game:
VTumbler brings your favorite Oshi to the world of Arcade Puzzle Fighting! Brought to you by FeFe and friends, you can compete for the strategic win with your friends, random strangers, or train with a CPU!

In the Online Modes, you can invite a friend or queue up against a random stranger to compete against. Do your best and beat them and their favorite Oshi with yours!

VTumbler is played for the best of 3 rounds, so you've gotta win 2. Either tactically stack gems, create power gems and explode them to surprise your opponent with a massive stack of counter gems, or constantly pressure them with little "presents" on their game board.

Be careful and watch your and your opponents game boards, the tide of battle can turn any second! Player vs. Player is bound to get your blood pumping, especially when your opponent takes all the gems you sent over and sends them right back at you!

Are you new to VTumbler and Puzzle Fighter games? We've got a relatively easy training mode set up just for you! This lets you experience the full extent of gameplay VTumbler has to offer, including seeing all the cute animations from your favorite VTuber. The Training CPU only does basic strategizing, but it knows how to randomly crack a jackpot and put you under pressure if you're not careful. Use training mode to get a feeling for the game and hop into online play afterwards to show everyone what you got!

  • Play Online Versus Friends

  • Play Online Versus Randoms

  • Character Select

  • Unique Character Animations

  • Stage Select

  • Puzzle-Combat Gameplay

name: VTumbler Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dive into the vibrant world of VTubers in an unparalleled free-to-play arcade puzzle fighting spectacle in VTumbler!
